upload.title: Upload your audio file
upload.description: Currently you can only upload MP3 files. More formats may come in the future.

marker.title: Set marker on your file
marker.description: After uploading, you can set markers on your audio file to highlight important sections.

share.title: Share your marker
share.description: Share a read-only link with others so they can view the markers you set on your audio file.

browser.title: Marker in Browser
browser.description: User with a read-only link can listen to the audio and see the markers you set, and they can set own marker which are available only in their browser.

caution.title: Be careful
caution.description: Upload only files were you own the rights to. Do not upload sensitive or private information. Read-only link can be used by anyone who has it, so share it only with people you trust.

PlaylistsList.title: Your Playlists
PlaylistsList.description: Organize your audio files into playlists ({playlistCount})
PlaylistsList.empty: No playlists created yet. Create your first playlist!

AudioFilesList.title: Your Audio Files
AudioFilesList.empty: No audio files uploaded yet. Upload your first audio file above!
AudioFilesList.noResults: No audio files match your search.

VisibilityBanner.public: This element is public and can be accessed by anyone with the link.
VisibilityBanner.private: This element is private and can only be accessed by you.

UnsavedChangesModal.title: Unsaved Changes
UnsavedChangesModal.body: You have unsaved changes. Do you want to save them before leaving?

AudioPlayer.subtitle: Audio Player
AudioPlayer.publicLinkTitle: Link to publicly available read-only player

error.title: Error Loading Audio
error.message: The audio file could not be loaded. Please check if the file exists and try again.

CreateAudioForm.title: New Audio Upload
CreateAudioForm.subtitle: Upload your MP3 audio file
CreateAudioForm.uploadInputError: Please provide an audio name and select a file.
CreateAudioForm.fileInvalidExtension: Please select a file with .mp3 extension.
CreateAudioForm.namePlaceholder: Enter a name for your audio
CreateAudioForm.descriptionPlaceholder: Add a description for your audio

DeleteModal.title: Delete Audio File
DeleteModal.body: Are you sure you want to delete this audio file? This action cannot be undone.

empty.suggestion: Create your first playlist to organize your audio files.

EmptyMarkerList.description: No markers added yet. Use the buttons above to add markers at specific timestamps.

StoredMarkers.title: Stored Audio Markers
StoredMarkers.subtitle: These markers are stored in the database and are also available on the listening page.

name.label: Audio Name
name.placeholder: Enter a name for your audio

description.label: Description (optional)
description.placeholder: Add a description for your audio

empty.noMatches: No audio files match your search.
empty.suggestion: Create your first audio file to add to playlists.

description.label: Description (optional)
description.placeholder: Add a description for your playlist

empty.noAudios: No audio files in this playlist yet.

section.title: Public Audios
section.description: Public audio files in this playlist

empty.noPublicAudios: No public audios in this playlist.

DeleteModal.title: Delete Playlist
DeleteModal.body: Are you sure you want to delete this playlist? This will not delete the audio files, only the playlist. This action cannot be undone.

name.label: Playlist Name
name.description: Give your playlist a descriptive name

description.label: Description (optional)
description.placeholder: Add a description for your playlist

emailRegistration.title: Email Registration
emailRegistration.description: New user registration via email (Nodemailer) is currently {status}.
emailRegistration.note: This setting is configured via the MAIL_REGISTRATION_ENABLED environment variable. Contact your system administrator to change this setting.

confirm.deleteAudio: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this audio? This action cannot be undone.
confirm.deletePlaylist: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this playlist? This action cannot be undone.

confirm.deleteUser: Are you sure you want to delete this user? This action cannot be undone.

isAdmin.label: Admin Access
isAdmin.description: Grant administrative privileges to this user

isDisabled.label: Disable Account
isDisabled.description: Prevent this user from signing in

AudioStatistics.title: Statistics - {name}
AudioStatistics.subtitle: Track listen activity for your audio file

chart.title: Listen Activity
chart.subtitle: Daily listens over the last {days} days
chart.noData: No listen activity in this period

AudioStatistics.peakDay: Peak activity: {date} with {count} {count, plural, one {listen} other {listens}}

PlaylistStatistics.title: Statistics - {name}
PlaylistStatistics.subtitle: Track listen activity for your playlist

chart.title: Listen Activity
chart.subtitle: Daily listens over the last {days} days
chart.noData: No listen activity in this period

PlaylistStatistics.peakDay: Peak activity: {date} with {count} {count, plural, one {listen} other {listens}}

inactiveAudios.title: Inactive Audios
inactiveAudios.description: Audios that have not been listened to in the last {days} days.
inactiveAudios.none: All audios have been listened to in the last {days} days
inactiveAudios.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"? The audio will be moved to the deleted items.
